-- | Usage: @'glCopyImageSubDataEXT' srcName srcTarget srcLevel srcX srcY srcZ dstName dstTarget dstLevel dstX dstY dstZ srcWidth srcHeight srcDepth@

-- This command is an alias for 'glCopyImageSubData'.
